text:
Gymhopper | Multiple Locations in Europe | www.gymhopper.com

We're a fast growing, fully funded SaaS B2B startup dragging gyms into the digital age. Based out of Zurich, Switzerland.

We are currently hiring for key country manager positions in markets across Europe, as well as sales/biz dev positions.

Awesome product, even better team and great traction.

Competitive compensation package (base + bonus + equity) dependent on experience and the country in question.

For more information, reach out via louisATgymhopperDOTcom
